analysis:
From last week (2025-08-04 to 2025-08-10), the sentiment surrounding PM was mixed, with a slight leaning towards positive. There were positive articles discussing PM as a growth stock, its international outlook, and volume increases in VEEV. There was also a neutral analysis presenting a bull case theory and a neutral piece on nicotine and beer. A negative article discussed a cash-producing stock to buy and stocks to avoid.

This week (2025-08-11 to 2025-08-12), the sentiment has shifted. One article was negative, citing potential offsets to MST declines at Altria. Another was neutral, reporting on USPS blocking a major vape distributor. The most recent article today (2025-08-12) is positive, focusing on Philip Morris' ILUMA rollout and its potential to drive volume growth.

Based solely on the provided sentiment values, the outlook for today (2025-08-12) is positive.

PM,2025-08-12,100.00,0.00,0.00,positive
